Hi, I'm Sam.

I consider myself a web developer and designer, but really like maps and all avenues of production design. I'm the lead designer & co-founder of Situated Laboratories and web developer at Creative Media Alliance.

I take care of a collaborative blog and am also an assistant editor of a design atlas. This is my portfolio and space for experiments.
